summary: Photo: According to the large clock over the arrivals board, he had ten minutes left to get on the train to Hogwarts and he had...
caption:
Photo: According to the large clock over the arrivals board, he had ten minutes left to get on the train to Hogwarts and he had no idea how to do it: he was stranded in the middle of a station with a trunk he could hardly life, a pocket full of wizard money and a large owl. (Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone)

LEGO Mini Figures: Number 1 - Harry Potter and Hedwig

title: Honest Harry Potter movie titles
body:
Harry Potter and the guy with Voldemort in the back of his head
Harry Potter and the Chamber of the Teen asshole and the huge lizard snake
Harry Potter and the Rat, Dog, and Werewolf.
Harry Potter and David Tennant
Harry Potter and the time Voldemort was a jealous 9-year old
Harry Potter and the really great potions book
Harry Potter and the confiscation of Voldy’s shiny toys
Harry Potter and the time Neville was great at advertising trains

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt:  Tom: All I'm saying, Harry, is that I will never care about the comfort of others above my own wants and needs. To me,...
body:
Prompt: 

Tom: All I’m saying, Harry, is that I will never care about the comfort of others above my own wants and needs. To me, my comfort always comes first.
Harry:
Harry:…Tom, you burnt down a guy’s house because you said it spoilt the view from your bedroom.

reblog.comment:

Tom: All I’m saying, Harry, is that I will never care about the comfort of others above my own wants and needs. To me, my comfort always comes first.
Harry:
Harry:…Tom, you burnt down a guy’s house because you said it spoilt the view from your bedroom.

summary: After a swift victory over a much more qualified candidate who mysteriously “pulled out for personal reasons” Donvolio Burke...
caption:
After a swift victory over a much more qualified candidate who mysteriously “pulled out for personal reasons” Donvolio Burke took his place as President of the Magical Congress of the United States of America. He immediately proposed laws that forced No-Maj and Wizard marriages to be declared to the government, with future marriages now needing written approval by the government. His new push for laws that ban No-Maj borns from attending Illvermorny has been met with uproar by the majority of the public, and has been stalled in the Magical Congress for the last 2 years. With the marauders set to return to school, the students of Ilvermorny can only try to go on living their lives as usual.

                               ILVERMORNY . 2018

         HOME // FULL PLOT // NAVIGATION

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
